name: filestash
tagline: A unified web interface for accessing files across servers and cloud storage
description: Filestash connects to cloud or FTP servers and exposes them through a user-friendly web UI. It supports WebDAV, S3, Git, Dropbox, and others with a single centralized UX. Aimed at developers and teams that need unified access.

features.title: Web-Based File Manager
features.description: Browse and manage files through a web interface

features.title: Multiple Storage Backends
features.description: Access files stored on local disks, SFTP, WebDAV, and cloud services

features.title: User Authentication
features.description: Restrict access using user accounts and login credentials

features.title: File Preview
features.description: Preview documents, images, audio, and video files in the browser

features.title: File Editing
features.description: Edit text-based files directly from the web interface

features.title: Shareable Links
features.description: Share files and folders using generated access links

features.title: Web Client Customization
features.description: Configure interface options and enabled features
